revised_title: Investigation of the Law of Burning of Modified Cordite
tldr: The author investigates the law of burning of modified cordite using a closed vessel apparatus and determines the relation between maximum pressure and density. The pressure-density relation is found to be P = 360A^3 - 54A^2 + 69.8A, where P is the pressure in tons per square inch and A is the gravimetric density of loading.
